1.name: Defense (Infantry)
1.text: Increases the defense of infantry units by ${1}%

2.name: Call of the Pack
2.text: When the army led by this commander has been reduced to 50% strength, increases defense of all troops by ${1}%

19.name: Hold The Line
19.text: When the army led by this commander contains only infantry units, gives troops a 10% chance to reduce damage taken by ${1}% for the next 2 seconds after being attacked

20.name: Snare of Thorns
20.text: Gives normal attacks a 10% chance to reduce target march speed by ${1}% for the next 2 seconds
